member.name: M:WaveEngine.Components.Graphics3D.SkinnedModelRenderer.Draw(System.TimeSpan)
member.remarks:
This method will only be called if all the following points are true:
The entity passes a frustrum culling test.
The parent of the owner of the cascades its visibility to its children and it is visible.
The is active.
The owner of the is active and visible.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.Components.UI.Stretch.None
member.summary: The image is not stretched to fill the output area. If the image is larger than the output area, the image is drawn to the output area, clipping what does not fit.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.Components.UI.Stretch.Fill
member.summary: The image is scaled to fit the output area. Because the image height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the image might not be preserved. That is, the image might be warped in order to completely fill the output container.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.Components.UI.Stretch.Uniform
member.summary: The image is scaled so that it fits completely within the output area. The image's aspect ratio is preserved.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.Components.UI.Stretch.UniformToFill
member.summary: The image is scaled so that it completely fills the output area while preserving the image's original aspect ratio.
